borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p><span style="color: rgb(36, 36, 36); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, system-ui, &quot;Apple Color Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Web&quot;, sans-serif;">The applicant has failed to present plans which accurately portray the development present at the application site. Specifically the plans fail to demonstrate&nbsp;</span><span style="color: rgb(36, 36, 36); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, system-ui, &quot;Apple Color Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Web&quot;, sans-serif; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;">the existing single storey rear extension at the dwelling</span><span style="color: rgb(36, 36, 36); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, system-ui, &quot;Apple Color Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Web&quot;, sans-serif;">.&nbsp;The proposal could prejudice third parties who may otherwise have wished to comment on the application; the proposed development cannot be accurately assessed and it cannot be demonstrated that it would be supported by the Development Plan. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:</span><br></p><p style="-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; margin-bottom: 0px; color: rgb(36, 36, 36); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, system-ui, &quot;Apple Color Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Web&quot;, sans-serif;">- National Planning Policy Framework&nbsp;National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (DLUHC, 2021)</p><p style="-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; margin-bottom: 0px; color: rgb(36, 36, 36); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, system-ui, &quot;Apple Color Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Web&quot;, sans-serif;">- Policy D4 of the London Plan (March 2021)</p><p style="-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; margin-bottom: 0px; color: rgb(36, 36, 36); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, system-ui, &quot;Apple Color Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Web&quot;, sans-serif;">- Policy CP3 of the&nbsp;Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)</p><p style="-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; margin-bottom: 0px; color: rgb(36, 36, 36); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, system-ui, &quot;Apple Color Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Web&quot;, sans-serif;">- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the&nbsp;Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)</p><p style="-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; margin-bottom: 0px; color: rgb(36, 36, 36); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, system-ui, &quot;Apple Color Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Web&quot;, sans-serif;">- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)</p><p style="-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; margin-bottom: 0px; color: rgb(36, 36, 36); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, system-ui, &quot;Apple Color Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI Web&quot;, sans-serif;">- Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of&nbsp;The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</p>

<div>By reason of the cumulative impact of the additions to the dwellinghouse and its roofscape, the proposed development will further dominate the&nbsp;dwellinghouse&nbsp;which will no longer reflect the character of the original&nbsp;dwellinghouse,&nbsp;resulting in harm to the appearance of the house, built form of the terrace and character of the area. The proposed positioning of the&nbsp;side windows, abutting the boundary with the neighbouring dwelling at no.73, could prejudice future development at&nbsp;the neighbouring dwelling, and as such&nbsp;are considered to present an inappropriate and unneighbourly arrangement.<br></div><div>As such, the proposed development is contrary to:<br></div><div><br></div><div><p><span style="" pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
National Planning Policy Framework </span>National Planning Policy Framework
(NPPF) (DLUHC, 2021)<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="line-height: 107%;" pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Policy D4 of the
London Plan (March 2021)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p><span style="" pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Policy
CP3 of the </span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)<o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="" pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies BP8 and BP11 of the </span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough
Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="line-height: 107%;" pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- The Residential
Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal">









</p><p><span style="" pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of </span>The London Borough of Barking and
Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)<o:p></o:p></p></div>
description: Construction of a hip-to-gable roof extension to accommodate a rear dormer extension with two roof lights to the front and construction of a first floor side extension
